mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, category_id, article_cover, article_title, SUBSTR(article_content, 1, 500) AS article_content, is_top, is_featured, status, a.create_time AS create_time, a.update_time AS update_time, u.nickname AS author_nickname, u.website AS author_website, u.avatar AS author_avatar, c.category_name AS category_name, tag_name FROM (SELECT id, user_id, category_id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, is_top, is_featured, is_delete, status, create_time, update_time FROM t_article) a LEFT JOIN t_article_tag at ON a.id = at.article_id LEFT JOIN t_tag t ON t.id = at.tag_id LEFT JOIN t_category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON a.user_id = u.id where a.is_delete = 0 and a.status in (1, 2) order by is_top desc, is_featured desc
